channel.title: Can't compile easyrsc server
channel.description:
well i have jre installed but when i try to compile my server this happens
[img]http://img8.imageshack.us/img8/7714/failedcompile.jpg[/img]

item.title: Can't compile easyrsc server
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

[quote=“Lukeidiot, post:13, topic:276980”][quote author=Jessekinss link=topic=365653.msg2775856#msg2775856 date=1241531578]

“unable to locate tools.jar”.

Download this;

https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewProductDetail-Start?ProductRef=java_ee_sdk-5_05-oth-JPR@CDS-CDS_Developer

Follow the path;

C:\Sun\SDK\jdk\lib\tools.jar

Copy and paste Tools.jar

Follow the path;

C:\Program\Java\jre1.6.0_07\lib\

Paste Tools.jar there.

lol, tools.jar is already included in jdk, and that’s not the problem.

The problem is that your “JAVA_HOME” path isn’t pointing at JDK

If you would have looked closely it says “JRE” in the CMD.

Yeah, because his path isnt set to JDK, its set to JRE…

Way to state the obvious.

Made no sence?

Sense* and I was reading it wrong.

Thanks mr. English.

Anytime sexy.
[/quote]

This is why I hacked BOTH of you guys servers. Your both are fucking dumbasses.[/quote]

AMG LETZ GIV DIS GUY A MEDALL 4 H1S L337 HAX4R SK1LLZ.

No kid, you didn’t “hack” shit. The fact that you even called it “hacking” is the #1 reason why I’m making fun of you. Dumb ass.

Read full topic
